md:
giải nghĩa từ "spread" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Spread (verb) - Phân tán, lan rộng

* Meaning: to move or stretch out over a larger area or to make something cover a larger area.
* Example sentence: The fire spread quickly through the dry forest.
* Related words: scatter, disperse, distribute
* Antonyms: gather, collect, concentrate

Spread (noun) - Khoảng cách, độ rộng

* Meaning: the distance or extent of something from one side to the other.
* Example sentence: The spread of the wingspan of the eagle was impressive.
* Related words: width, breadth, scope
* Antonyms: narrowness, confinement, limitation

Spread (verb) - Phết, trét

* Meaning: to apply or distribute a substance evenly over a surface.
* Example sentence: She spread butter on her toast.
* Related words: apply, smear, daub
* Antonyms: remove, wipe, clean

Note: The verb "spread" can also have other meanings depending on the context, such as to spread rumors or to spread awareness.
